section.p: NeuraSaMu is an application that will completely change your messaging and calling experience with AI-powered features and next-level privacy.

button.class: btn-gradient text-white font-bold py-3 px-8 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transform hover:scale-105 transition-all duration-300

div.class: card p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg border border-pink-400
div.p: Our AI agents can be your friend, business partner, or teacher. Use them in groups of up to 5 friends for real-time information, calculations, coding help, and even to correct mistakes.

div.class: card p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg border border-pink-400
div.p: Forget boring alarms. Our AI will call you with a motivational message to help you succeed. Set reminders for your tasks, and the AI will call to keep you on track.

div.class: card p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg border border-pink-400
div.p: Make both local (SIM) and online calls from a single chat screen. The app also shows your complete call history for direct, easy access.

div.class: card p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg border border-pink-400
div.p: Experience seamless online and offline messaging. Share high-quality photos and videos without any compression, so every moment is captured in its true glory.

div.class: card p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg border border-pink-400
div.p: AI noise reduction, loudness control, and high-quality video calls. AI framing ensures you are always in the perfect frame.

div.class: card p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg border border-pink-400
div.p: Two types of storage: Secure internal storage for business users and cloud storage for regular users. Your chats and media will always be secure.

section.h2: Ready to step into the future?
section.p: NeuraSaMu is designed for businesses and students to get the best communication experience.
